Subject: Update on Your Order (ORD-5001)

Dear [Customer Name],

This email is to provide a quick update on your order, ORD-5001.

Your order has been confirmed and is currently being processed for shipment. You will receive a separate email with tracking information as soon as it becomes available.

Thank you for your order!

Sincerely,

The [Your Company Name] Team
